!define DISConnection {DIS_Demo01}
!define IDQProjectName {Demo}
!define IDQFolderName {FitNesseDemos}

!4 Arguments in first line:
- DIS to run the profile on
- IDQ Project - Project name
- Log level fixture

!4 Per line:
- Project - Project name
- Folder name (if any)
- Profile name

!4 Run Profile
!|Data Profiling  |${DISConnection}|${IDQProjectName}|VERBOSE                                                |
|Project Name     |Folder Name     |Profile Name     |run profile?|get result message?|get log filename link?|
|${IDQProjectName}|${IDQFolderName}|Profile_DUAL     |OK          |                   |                      |

!4 Run Scorecard
!|Data Profiling  |${DISConnection}|${IDQProjectName}|VERBOSE                                                  |
|Project Name     |Folder Name     |Scorecard Name   |run scorecard?|get result message?|get log filename link?|
|${IDQProjectName}|${IDQFolderName}|sc_Dual          |OK            |                   |                      |
